```{r setup}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = FALSE)
```


```{r load-data, cache=TRUE}
data(economics, package = "ggplot2")
```

```{r, load-packages, cache=TRUE}
library(ggplot2)
```


## Left

### One

```{r display-econ}
DT::renderDataTable(
  DT::datatable((economics))
)
```

### Selector {data-height=250}
```{r hist-var}
selectInput(
  inputId = "histVar",
  label = "Please select a column",
  choices = names(economics)
)
```



## Right

### Top

```{r hist-econ}
renderPlot(
  ggplot(economics, aes_string(x=input$histVar)) +
    geom_histogram()
)
```


### Bottom

```{r scatter-econ}
renderPlot(
  ggplot(economics, aes_string(x = input$histVar, y = "pce")) +
    geom_point()
)

```
